description: Modified Gantt Chart - Shape-based Activity View for Medical Education

signals.name: maxHeight
signals.description: Maximum height before scrolling kicks in

signals.name: heightPadding
signals.description: Extra padding for dynamic height calculation

signals.name: dynamicHeight
signals.update: enableDynamicHeight ? max(minHeight, min(maxHeight, data('yScale').length * yRowHeight + heightPadding)) : 500

signals.name: startGrain
signals.description: Days, Months, Years or All - Years is default

signals.name: colorParameter
signals.description: Controls color scheme - delivery_format or request_type

signals.name: labelParameter
signals.description: Controls text labels - delivery_format, activity_start_date, or request_id

signals.name: filterResistance
signals.description: Prevents automatic reset to Days when filters change

signals.name: maintainGranularity
signals.description: Maintains current time granularity when Power BI filters change

signals.name: yRowPadding
signals.description: Row padding as % of yRowHeight (each side)

on.update: x() < columnsWidth ? clamp(yScroll + event.deltaY * 3, 0, max(0, scaledHeight - height)) : yScroll

y.signal: needsScroll ? (yScroll / (scaledHeight - height)) * (height - max(20, height * height / scaledHeight)) : 0

signals.name: xDom
signals.update: [max(datetime(2020, 0, 1), today - (ganttWidth/2) * oneDay / minDayBandwidth), today + (ganttWidth/2) * oneDay / minDayBandwidth]

on.update: span(xDomPre)<xDomMinSpan?[anchor + (xDom[0] - anchor) * (zoom*(xDomMinSpan/span(xDomPre))), anchor + (xDom[1] - anchor) * (zoom*(xDomMinSpan/span(xDomPre)))]:span(xDomPre)>xDomMaxSpan?[anchor + (xDom[0] - anchor) * (zoom*(xDomMaxSpan/span(xDomPre))), anchor + (xDom[1] - anchor) * (zoom*(xDomMaxSpan/span(xDomPre)))] :xDomPre
[xCur[0] + span(xCur) * delta[0] / width, xCur[1] + span(xCur) * delta[0] / width]
needsScroll ? clampRange( [yCur[0] + span(yCur) * delta[1] / scaledHeight, yCur[1] + span(yCur) * delta[1] / scaledHeight], 0, scaledHeight - height) : [0, scaledHeight]
yCur[0]==yRange[0] && yCur[1]==yRange[1]&& xCur[0]===xDom[0]&& xCur[1]===xDom[1] && datum.phase==datum.task?  {phase: datum.phase, project: datum.project}:null

marks.name: organizationGridLines
marks.description: Horizontal grid lines for each Organization group

tooltip.signal: showTooltips ? (datum.phase == datum.task ? {'Grant Title': datum.phase} : {'Activity': datum.task, 'Grant Title': datum.phase}) : null

fill.signal: toString(datum.id) == itemHovered.id && datum.phase == datum.task ?merge(hsl(scale('cDark', datum.project)), {l:0.40}):datum.phase == datum.task ?scale('cDark', datum.project):'transparent'

shape.signal: datum.phase == datum.task && !indata('collapsedPhases', 'phase', datum.phase)?'triangle-down':datum.phase == datum.task && indata('collapsedPhases', 'phase', datum.phase)?'triangle-right':''

marks.name: activityShapes
marks.description: Activity shapes for delivery formats - colored by delivery format

tooltip.signal: showTooltips&&down==null?{'Organization':datum.project,'Grant Title':datum.phase ,'Delivery Format':datum.task , 'Activity Start':timeFormat(datum.start,'%a, %d %B %Y' ),'Activity End':timeFormat(datum.end,'%a, %d %B %Y' ), 'Learner Level':datum.continuum, 'Activity Completed %': datum.activityCompleted }:null

marks.name: collapsedActivityShapes
marks.description: Activity shapes on grant title lines when collapsed

tooltip.signal: showTooltips&&down==null?{'Organization':datum.project,'Grant Title':datum.phase ,'Delivery Format':datum.task , 'Activity Start':timeFormat(datum.start,'%a, %d %B %Y' ),'Activity End':timeFormat(datum.end,'%a, %d %B %Y' ), 'Learner Level':datum.continuum, 'Activity Completed %': datum.activityCompleted }:null

marks.name: activityLabels
marks.description: Text labels for activities when drilled down

marks.name: taskSelector
marks.description: Hidden rect to support phase expand and collapse
